Text: Ugh. This has some sort of glitch or anti pirate software on it. It was fine at first, but after a while, I was unable to unlock more characters even though I beat Time Attack, and even though I set the difficulty meter to 2, arcade mode was always stuck on the hardest difficulty. Very annoying.
